description: Main application Flutter source file defining the main widget, app structure, and home page.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget of the Flutter application, setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the home screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: The state class for MyHomePage, building the UI including app bar and centered content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the Flutter app, runs MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState instances.
